definition[0]: a position on a scale that shows how good someone or something is when compared with others
example[0]: She is now fifth in the world rankings.
definition[1]: a ranking person has a high, or the highest, position in an organization or is one of the best at an activity
example[1]: the panel’s ranking Democrat, William Clay
example[2]: He’s the ship’s ranking officer  (=the one with the highest rank).
definition[2]: used to say where someone or something is on a scale that shows how good they are, or what position they have, compared with other people or things
definition[3]: the position of something or someone in a list that has been arranged in order of quality or importance
example[4]: The US recaptured from Germany the number one ranking among exporters.
definition[4]: a list of things or people in order of quality or importance
example[5]: a ranking of the 30 largest US cities on the basis of finance and management
